scripts.q: rm -rf ./dist && npm run prettier && npm run build && babel-node dist/index.js
scripts.q-win: if exist dist ( rmdir /s /q dist ) && npm run prettier && npm run build && babel-node dist/index.js
scripts.prettydiff: npm run prettier && git status && git diff
scripts.start: rm -rf ./dist && npm run prettier && npm run lint && npm run build && babel-node dist/index.js
scripts.start-clean: npm run clean && npm i && npm start
scripts.start-win: if exist dist ( rmdir /s /q dist ) && npm run prettier && npm run lint && npm run build && babel-node dist/index.js
scripts.start-clean-win: npm run clean-win && npm i && npm run start-win
